name: Dungeoneers (itch) (Skeletax)
description:
In the far away land of Barthoview, you are but a small-time adventurer. You’ve never had many large-scale adventures, but you’ve just gotten word that there is a nearby dungeon with untold riches protected within. Many have tried, but none have reached the end to get the huge pile of gold, artifacts, and things even the big-name adventures haven’t heard of. Are you up to the task?

Explore an infinitely generated dungeon and defeat the enemies that lie within. Gather new weapons and items to last as long as you can. Get to the top of the leaderboard!
